header.title: AI Game Server Builder
header.subtitle: Instantly generate your custom server files

form.title: Server Configuration
form.gameNameTooltip: Select the game you want to create a server for. If your game is not listed, choose 'Other'.
form.customGameNamePlaceholder: e.g., V Rising, 7 Days to Die
form.customGameNameTooltip: Enter the game name if it's not in the dropdown list.
form.serverNameTooltip: The name that will appear in the in-game server browser.
form.botNameTooltip: The name of your Discord bot application.
form.botActivityTooltip: The status message that will appear under your bot's name on Discord.
form.playerCountTooltip: Set the maximum number of players that can join the server at once.
form.serverPortTooltip: The network port the server will run on. Ensure this port is forwarded on your router if you want players to connect from the internet.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., PvE focus, 2x loot, list of mods...
form.descriptionTooltip: Describe the purpose of your server. Mention any rules, mods, or special settings (e.g., PvE, 2x loot).
form.worldSeedTooltip: Enter a specific seed to generate a world or a map name. Leave blank for a random/default world.
form.randomizeSeedTooltip: Generate a random seed for a new world.
form.validationAlert: Please select or enter a game name.

minecraft.gameModeTooltip: Sets the default game mode for players.
minecraft.enablePvpTooltip: Allows players to damage each other.
minecraft.onlineModeTooltip: Requires players to be authenticated with Mojang servers. Disable for offline/cracked servers.
minecraft.enforceWhitelistTooltip: If true, only players on the whitelist can join the server. Recommended for private servers.
minecraft.downloadJarTooltip: Download the server .jar file for a specific Minecraft version. This is required to run the server.
minecraft.fetchFallback: Could not load live versions. Displaying a cached list instead.
minecraft.downloadError: The download could not be started. This might be due to a pop-up blocker or a network issue. Please try the 'Copy Link' button as an alternative.

valheim.serverPasswordTooltip: Set a password to make your server private.

discordBot.clientIdPlaceholder: Paste your bot's client ID here
discordBot.clientIdTooltip: Find this on the 'General Information' page of your application in the Discord Developer Portal. It's required for registering slash commands.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.discordWebhookUrlTooltip: Enter a Discord webhook URL to receive a notification when your server files are generated.

results.title: Generated Output
results.loadingSubtitle: The AI is working its magic. Please wait a moment.
results.initialPlaceholderSubtitle: Complete the configuration on the left and click 'Generate' to create your custom game server files.
results.zipAlert: Please select at least one file to download.
